elements.description:
# cells-validate-amount-input

Enter amount component.

Example:
```html
<cells-validate-amount-input></cells-validate-amount-input>
```

```

## Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling:

| Custom property | Description     | Default        |
|:----------------|:----------------|:--------------:|
| --cells-validate-amount-input  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-validate-amount-input-step-inactive  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-validate-amount-input-step-inactive__txt  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-validate-amount-input__txt  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-validate-amount-input__btn  | empty mixin     | {}             |

eslint new-cap: [2, {"capIsNewExceptions": ["AmountBehavior"]}]

properties.name: setAmount
properties.description: Amount set in the input from the outside.

properties.name: amount
properties.description:
Output amount.
Not visible

properties.name: pattern
properties.description: Input pattern validation

properties.name: numeralPositiveOnly
properties.description: Allow only positive numbers in amount input

properties.name: maxChars
properties.description: Limit max characters in amount input

properties.name: name
properties.description:
Name required in amount component
Mandatory and needs to be unique to avoid conflicts with cleave.js

properties.name: language
properties.description: Language for the currency

properties.name: currencyCode
properties.description: ISO 4217 code for the currency

properties.name: localCurrency
properties.description: ISO 4217 code for the local currency

properties.name: initialCurrency
properties.description: initial currency value before to be changed

properties.name: iconSize
properties.description: The icon size of the icon displayed on info and error messages. View documentation for the icon component

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: When setted, the amount entered should be a multiple of this number

properties.name: hideContinueBtn
properties.description: Hide continue button

properties.name: image
properties.description: Image to show in cells-molecule-amount-input component

properties.name: hideSelectorIcon
properties.description: Hide select-modal selector icon

properties.name: amountImage
properties.description: Image to place inside amount input

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label to show as placeholder inside amount-input

properties.name: infoMessage
properties.description: Info message to show below amount input. Can be used with ${min} ${max} ${userBalance} ${multiple} ${_userRemainingBalance}

properties.name: _computedInfoMessage
properties.description: Already translated info message with amounts filled inside literal

properties.name: hideInfoMessage
properties.description: Hide info message

properties.name: hideDecimalsMessage
properties.description: Hide amount decimals in info/error messages

properties.name: max
properties.description: Max limit to validate amount

properties.name: min
properties.description: Min limit to validate amount

properties.name: userBalance
properties.description: User Balance to validate amount input and calculate user remaining balance after the input

properties.name: _userRemainingBalance
properties.description: Auto calculated remaining balance with user balance and amount input

properties.name: _valid
properties.description: Auto calculated boolean indicating if amount is valid depending on limits/balance

properties.name: invalid
properties.description: Negation of `_valid` to comply with cells inputs `invalid` property

properties.name: _buttonIsEnabled
properties.description: Indicates if continue button should be enabled

properties.name: _allAmounts
properties.description: Auto calculated object containing all amounts introduced, to correctly format them and use them in info/error messages

properties.name: errorMessage
properties.description: Error message

properties.name: _computedErrorMessage
properties.description: Already translated error message with amounts filled inside literal

properties.name: errorPrefix
properties.description: Prefix to include in error messages. This way every operative can have different keys for same error validation messages.

properties.name: remainingInfoMessage
properties.description: When user sets a remainingInfoMessage, user can see his remaining balance with a different message when entering an amount

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If true, the element is disabled

properties.name: buttonEventName
properties.description: Event dispatched on validate button pressed

properties.name: amountChangedEventName
properties.description: Event dispatched on amount changed pressed

properties.name: defaultAmountClasses
properties.description: Default class set in cells-molecule-amount-input

properties.name: amountClasses
properties.description: Class set in cells-molecule-amout-input

properties.name: setInitialDecimals
properties.description: Flag to control if formatting of the initial amount is not necessary

properties.name: autoFormat
properties.description:
IF Enabled the value of the input will change to the output
on blur. Turning "0" into "0.00"

properties.name: customErrorMessage
properties.description: Text label used when a custom message is needed at the error message

properties.name: disableDecimal
properties.description: If true, deny the insert of decimals

properties.name: customErrorMessageMin
properties.description: Text label used when a custom message is needed at the error message on min amount

properties.name: customErrorMessageMax
properties.description: Text label used when a custom message is needed at the error message on max amount

properties.name: validateOnInputChange
properties.description: If enabled will use _validate on amount-input-changed instead of __validateOnAmountChanged

properties.name: showInputRightCurrencyIcon
properties.description: Flag that handles the right currency icon of the input

properties.name: spaceCurrency
properties.description: if true, currency space appears

properties.name: disableValidateOnFocusOut
properties.description: disable validate input on focus out

properties.name: disableValidateOnBlur
properties.description: disable validate input on blur

properties.name: type
properties.description: Input type config

properties.name: inputMode
properties.description: Input mode config

methods.name: _validate
methods.description: Validates amount with every condition set

methods.name: __validateUserBalance
methods.description: Checks if user has enough balance for the amount user has introduced

methods.name: __validateMultiple
methods.description: Checks if a multiple is set and amount introduced is multiple of that number

methods.name: __validateMinAndMax
methods.description: Validates amount input with mix and max

methods.name: __validateMax
methods.description: Validates if amount is below max

methods.name: __validateMin
methods.description: Validates if amount is above min

methods.name: computeAllAmounts
methods.description: Generates an object containing all formated amounts available for translation function in locales.

methods.name: computeInfoMessage
methods.description: Translates the info message set, this is made here because we have all amounts available for translation

methods.name: computeErrorMessage
methods.description: Translates the error message set, this is made here because we have all amounts available for translation

methods.name: _sendAmountOutput
methods.description: Dispatches an event with the amount set

methods.name: __setButtonEnabled
methods.description: Sets correct value for validate button to be enabled

methods.name: __getAmountClasses
methods.description: Computed the classes set in <cells-molecule-amount-input> and return concat of string params.

methods.name: _onKeyboardEnter
methods.description: Fires the blur after clicking enter on the keyboard
